channel.title: Philosophy on Examined Algorithms
channel.description: Recent content in Philosophy on Examined Algorithms

item.title: Why Philosophy?
item.description: Why Philosophy? What else has the breadth and ambition to assess and grapple with the contemporary scene? It is the endeavour best positioned between demands of intellectual rigour and moral imagination. Its tools encompass logic and probabilistic reasoning, thought experiments, just-so stories, rhetorical flourish and literary style. It dabbles in all the domains of the special sciences seeking patterns and fruitful abstractions. Yet the sum of a particular philosophy is not any linear combination of the above.
